User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-GB; rv:1.9.2.15) Gecko/20110303 Firefox/3.6.15

Whenever I put my mouse over the menubars it goes black. When I put my mouse over X close tabs it turns blue. Also, when putting the mouse over the scroll bar it turns blue.

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: honestangel1@hotmail.com
